website_summaries.verdict: A wide assortment of tools you could use to work on HVAC systems as well as a variety of other home projects.
pros: This expansive kit contains a number of essential HVAC tools, from pliers, a wire cutter, and wrenches to screwdrivers, a utility knife, and a level
There are 168 pieces in all, tightly organized in a highly portable carrying case
cons: Some tools do not stay secure in the case during transport, and the durability may not be as impressive as other tool kits

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best home set ever
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set! I have 4 other combination tool sets for cars and different parts of the house. I've wanted a great all in one set. This one finally puts all the tools for a house in one easy to carry and use package. The quality is as expected. The adjustable wrench popped out of position, but I was trying to do something it wasn't designed for. No surprises. This set really impresses me. I've replaced a shower stall, exhaust fan, lighting, and several other projects. It works great for quick jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Joesomebody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool set to have
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool set to have, even aside from Auto Repair. However I did use some of the tools to change some parts on my car. I love having this because I'm getting into the habit of either building my own things or fixing what I already have. The tools are also really solid and don't feel cheap. The only thing is I WISH it had wrench extensions, but that was because cars have bolts/screws in some of the most hard to reach places...but oh well!
customer_reviews.author: StevieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: You can find everything you need at this set. ...
customer_reviews.text: You can find everything you need at this set .even for fixing Car screws for wheels or interior hard place screw which you might end up buying another set.This tool set has everything you need . I gave 5 star!!!
customer_reviews.author: KABIRAHMED

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Tool Set! Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for someone and I was extremely impressed, as was the recipient! This tool set is no joke! The quality of the tools are top-notch and have good weight to them. Other than a cordless drill and a drill bit set, you pretty much have every tool you will need for your home at your disposal. The design and Contour of the case is absolutely stunning and looks very futuristic.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Not super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Not super high quality, but a good set for occasional use. The case keeps everything in one place and is of fairly good quality. A little pricey for what it is, but not a total rip-off either. I bought one for my daughter to have at her apartment and for that purpose it will work fine. Anyone who works with tools or owns other decent tools will not be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Montague

customer_reviews.title: Tools are really amazing and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool set one must buy., and I am very pleased with my purchase. It is really a wonder to think how I managed before without this. It is a great bargain and even compared to other set in the market. I actually wanted one tool kit like this to make my garage shelfing. The tools are higher quality and this was my major concern before I purchased. I highly recommend one must get this kit and you will never go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality - Not worth it - Channel locks worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these! super cheap low quality - tools fall out every-time you close it too. The channel locks are worthless and don't lock in channels at all - if you try to put force on them they just pop open. Save your self the frustration and buy some nice tools.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Too cheesy - skip this if you plan to use them more than a couple times a year
customer_reviews.text: It was too cheesy to give as a Christmas gift and I returned it. The selection is awesome, but the sticky pliers, chrome plated screw driver bits, flimsy saw, cheesy tape measure... everything I looked at was TOO cheap. I own Stanley / Craftsman grade tools, and this is like 3 steps below that.
customer_reviews.author: James Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: This had a really bad toxic smell. The tools did not stay put, a jumbled mess at each opening.
customer_reviews.author: friend

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: I had another tool kit in my cart for a brand I will not mention for the longest while but when I saw this beauty, it had all the other kit entailed plus more. I though the case itself might have been made of cheap plastic but that is not the case, no pun intended. It is a sturdy kit, well packed and the tool of themselves are of great quality. It is Good to have if you a DIY kind of person.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and low quality. If you need tools that can actually work, go to your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive set
customer_reviews.text: I typically think these all in one sets aren't all that but this one is amazing! I like to have one handy in the car for all those crazys times you are out in the world and need something for a scout meeting, school event, soccer game etc. This has been an amazing set that is quality hardware and has an amazing set of things that have let me replace a railing, fix a soccer chair, and setup for a school presentation all spur of the moment. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: While they are not craftsman quality they do the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend as a gift and after looking at the tools I would say they are pretty sturdy, but I can see how they might fail at some point with heavy usage. Still for the price, to have in the car or at home for someone that only needs tools once in a while this is a great value. I got a similar kit--a smaller one--for my car so that I can do road side repairs and I am very happy with the purchase. The case is very nice too. Tools stay put when you open the case, even after shaking it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: ShutterBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am not a handyman or mechanic by any stretch of the imagination, but will undertake basic repairs around our house. Was always frustrated never could locate the right tool for the right job where this toolkit is just the right size and includes everything you need for basic home repairs. Easy to store was a requirement and while some people say their sockets and other tolls easily come loose...I’ve not seen it as a problem myself.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sifford

customer_reviews.title: Quality is questionable. Broken out of the brand new box. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I should keep this or return it. I was super excited ordering this but felt something wasn't right when i heard rattles in the box. Opened it open to find one of the screw driver was already defective or broken. Also, some of the tools don't sit very well within the case. Not sure how long it'll keep in its place. Quality of long term rigorous usage is questionable. For the price , I was expecting very high quality tools inside. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: May T.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff, but as others have said, not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was initially fairly happy with this set. It has a wide variety of tools. Some of it seems like it was thrown in to increase the count of items in it, but the essentials are there. Today, I was using the ratchet and one of the sockets was not coming off. I had to give it a light tap and one of the screws came out and won’t thread back in place, so it’s trash. I bought the set six months ago, so I’m stuck with a socket set with no ratchet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Givens

customer_reviews.title: some sockets don't fix in case
customer_reviews.text: This tool set would be 4-5 stars but there's 2-3 sockets that don't fit tightly in the case so they would fall out of their positions and rattle around the case. For me, it was 5.5" and 13". Instead of returning the whole set I had an old 13" socket that fit better. For the 5.5" I wrapped electric tape two times to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap tools, but not good tools
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this tool set because the others said the tools were cheaply made, and this one's reviews didn't. The tools aren't super cheap, but they're definitely not good either. I'm used to a little more firmness and weight to my tools than these. If you apply pressure to the level, the plastic will give quite a lot -- I think levels shouldn't really bend...
customer_reviews.author: Aturen

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the price. Great variety of tools of decent quality. Nice carrying case though some items do not fit perfectly in the molded plastic. One of the nylon clips was broken on arrival. Dekopro provided very good customer service and an immediate response when I reached out. I would recommend this kit as a good all around value priced kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dekopro tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dekopro tool kit for my RV. The tools are of poor quality and difficult to use because of this. For example, the kit provided several clamps (all plastic) which all broke during the first use. The ratchet wrench is flimsy and weak.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lee

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable is missing the nut
customer_reviews.text: So far not so good When I opened up the box nothing was in it's holding place. I did not take pictures of that. Have not used any of it but one of the adjustables was defective. It was missing a nut to hold it together. EDIT-Seller has reached out and was very kind. He offered a $40.00 dollar refund to the defective adjustable. I have changed my rating from a 1 star to a 3 star rating. All is good now.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool set
customer_reviews.text: Got these on prime day, everything you need for small home projects is in the box. That being said the quality of this stuff is phenomenal. Tools at this price range I have tried from lowes, , home depot and harbor freight I buy for one project as they are poor quality products. These are sturdy and well built. I will pick up these as gifts to family members in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this kit is noticeable as soon as you open it, which is poor. It comes with 4 clamps and as you can see in these pictures, every one of them was broken when I opened the case. If you are looking for a kit you might use once or twice a year, then maybe this is for you. Otherwise, I would look for a more durable product Update: Customer service reached out and offered a 50% refund. I am happy with their response
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Joy

customer_reviews.title: decent enough quality for home owners and DIY projects
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bunch of tools and figured I might as well invest in a tool kit for some work around the house and such. Most of the tools are good enough quality, though the level, cutting knife, and saw, seem too cheap. However, there are plenty of ratchet sockets which can be very useful there and a hammer as well (smaller tool kits usually don't have them). The box itself is a bit heavy, but overall quality is good enough for the average home owner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Set -  Best I have found for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I did not realize how many uses I would have for all of them. There are tools for just about anything you might need around the home. A LOT of useful tools. Most I did not even know I would be using or needing at the time. I am surprised at how much I have used this set and how much money it has saved me. I had a brief exchange with the seller and they get an A+ also along with the tools!
customer_reviews.author: JeffWeHo

customer_reviews.title: Trash Box
customer_reviews.text: This tool box is trash if u work with tools on a daily this is not for you tools were all over once I first received my package that means the tool box it self is junk not worth the price save a little more if u have to an get something better straight trash lol
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made but lots of options
customer_reviews.text: This toolbox definitely has all of the essentials, it would probably be enough to get most jobs done. All the drill bits it came with are not quite straight, a few of the bits are so warped they are not usable at all. The saw is definitely cheap, it is fine for plastic and some woods, but can’t cut through basic metals. Just to further demonstrate how cheap it is, I’m pretty sure the level will only last a few times simple because it almost snaps when trying to put it back into the slot on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Towstik

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! Excellent set for the price, already love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool set with everything you need. I got tired of constantly having to explore our maintenance supervisors shop for a screwdriver or hammer (he is disorganized) so I purchased this for our business. These aren't an something an avid "tool guy" would keep in his garage but I must say, the quality seems really excellent. This would make a great gift for any first time homeowner, small business owner, or anyone needing a full set at an affordable price. Do yourself a favor, and order one.
customer_reviews.author: San A.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the amount of money. None of my sockets fit in the case properly so the tools all bang around everytime you closed it or move it. My clamps and screwdriver arrived broken. The thing that upsets me the most is that the socket wrench will not hold any of the sockets in place so is not useable. The socket lock on the wrench is defective. Not very good quality at all. Tried to reach out to the seller to mitigate this review but do not see a contact seller feature on amazon for this order.
customer_reviews.author: Harambe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tools
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of tools here and they're perfectly fine. But it's a starter set. These are not the tools you will die owning and who will miss working with you when you're gone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: left feeling like I got more than what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by this kit. It's surprisingly high quality, though I guess it was a bit pricey ... either way, left feeling like I got more than what I paid for. The nice thing is the tools fit tightly into the case so the chances of everything staying put are pretty solid, ha. And the bits and screwdrivers are magnetic which I appreciate, figured they'd be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: So far decent.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things that you buy because it has basically everything you need in one box, whether it's minor computer repair to auto repair or home repair. It also all comes in one portable case which is nice. Some of the tools feel cheap however and you can get comparable tool sets for like 50 bucks, but this set had a little more than most comparable sets offer. I would rather have all of the basics in one box then have multiple boxes to open and search.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Great basic tool kit for having at home
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basic and compact tool kit for keeping at my apartment. This kit includes pretty much everything you may need for any occasional home repair or for assembling furniture. The tools seem of decent quality, but you can see that are not built for heavy duty jobs. The box is made of good quality plastic, and the tools fit perfectly in the spaces. However, don't expect the box will be able to take heavy hits or drops. As I said, this is a kit made for the occasional home repair or improvement project or an occasional car fix.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good versatility.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you understand what your asking for this is well worth the money. A solid tool set with great versatility for smaller to medium sized projects. At home or on the road this tool kit will probably have a solution for when in need.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality for the price, handles have broken with little use, and the rubber grips to the tools have come off with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan H.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Socket holders
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift, multiple socket holders were not working properly, so sockets not secure and falling all over the kit when closed. Returned and ordered another one, and same situation, multiple socket holders loose. Will be returning and looking for another brand .
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: This tool set has EVERYTHING you could ever need. We are recently renovating our home and this tool set was absolutely perfect. Everything we’re putting together has been covered by this. Absolutely love it and it would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Homeowner? Buy A DEKOPRO Toolset. Fair, Great Product and Good Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: As a new homeowner who was never a handy man, I decided on getting a toolset for the house for any applicable job. I decided on this 168 piece toolset by DEKOPRO and its been put to use countless times since I've bought it last month. The price is very fair and the equipment feels very good. The customer service from DEKOPRO has been very responsive to me to when I needed help. If you're looking for a good set for yourself, you can not go wrong with this. I am in the market for more tools and you bet I will be looking at their product list first before anything.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Le

customer_reviews.title: Some sockets don't stay in their places.
customer_reviews.text: The tools are great, but the case itself isn't the best. Some of the slots for tools are either too tight or too loose. This is causing some of the sockets to fall off their places every time I close and open the case.
customer_reviews.author: Sumanth

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection of handy tools
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this set to my stepdaughter and her bf because they had a motley collection of tools and with this set they have hung several pictures around their apartment and replaced some trim pieces and done a few other small jobs. Nice collection of tools.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. haught Jr.

customer_reviews.title: All you need - great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toolbox! I bought it for a second home and it has everything I need. Quality is great and I like the case. I feel like I wasted so much money on other tool sets and this is all I needed. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kane

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I honestly like just about everything. I understand it's a cheaper kit so I'm not expecting all the tools to be like Kline quality. The only issue I have is the case. Lots of the tools fall out of place just by placing the case vertically. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rican408

customer_reviews.title: Nice Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my little sis for her b-day, as she has recently begun trying her hand at turning a wrench here and there around the house. I used to be a mechanic, so knew I wanted to get her something of good quality with a wide variety of necessary tools. After consulting the reviews I decided on this set. And it was a hit! Every one in her house tried to take claim, but she held firm and hammered them into submission. Definitely recommend for a keep-around-the-house for small projects kit.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic material.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like to plastic material for clamps. It was broken 3 of them when it arrived. And also qualoty of material is low for the tools. Beside that it is good tool box pretty much has everything.
customer_reviews.author: Talha

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for home and light duty repairs
customer_reviews.text: This particular kit only contains metric sockets (didn't thoroughly read description). I returned and got the same brank kit that had both metric and standard sockets. That kit was on sale cost $5 more.
customer_reviews.author: J B Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Fairly complete set.
customer_reviews.text: I could have sworn the description said it had both metric and SAE size sockets, but it only has Metric. Many of the pieces will not stay in place with the case closed. Otherwise it seems like a sturdy set to have around for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Tikshadow

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight tools
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. Although I havn't used any of the tools yet...they seem to be of quality. As with other reviews, some of the sockets don't stay in their holders, so when you close the lid, they fall out. but most do stay put. Be aware - it's all metric: wrenches and sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Joyfulpursuits

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching tool kit options... landed on these as a great balance of price, tools included, portability/space usage, and reviews. They haven't disappointed. There are cheaper options and more expensive options. I didn't find any that offered the same breadth of tools for this price point, and the quality, so far, as held up. For a home user (not contractor), these are good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: A Lot More Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toolset because I needed something cheap and convenient. I thought it would have been cheaply made and good enough to just get the jobs done. I am in complete awe every time I use this set. I've had this set for over a year now and I love everything about it (except the saw is only good based on the project you're using it for). Great purchase. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: General

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our motor home, never know when you will need a tool out there, good selection and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last. Practically all the pieces are gone. Will probably work for someone who use it ones in a month. It looks great just like the pictures Case very comfortable feels good to the touch
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! No complaints from us yet!
customer_reviews.text: This was more then we needed for a new apartment but had everything we needed just in case! It is a great kit to have on hand and has come in great use! Some of the tools do fall out of place once and awhile but it doesn't bother us much at all.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaVD

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Horse trailer
customer_reviews.text: When traveling with horses you need to be prepared for just about anything, never seem to have all the tools when something breaks so far this have been useful.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Aloha Mr Bezos! You Rock Sir! This is an AMAZON AMAZING TOOL KIT. EVERYTHING I NEED TO MAKE MY OLD MITSUBISHI MONTERO RUN. NEED TO ADJUST THE LIFTERS! MR BEZOS I HEARD THAT YOU HAVE NO CLUE WHAT OR WHEN THE TAX DEADLINE IS! NO TAXES FOR AMAZON! GREAT TOOL KIT. EVERYONE NEEDS ONE! CAPTAIN STANLEY J HOWARD IRS ENROLLED AGENT AND UNDERCOVER COP
customer_reviews.author: Stanley. J Howard IRS ENROLLED AGENT

customer_reviews.title: This was delivered in less than 24 hours...
customer_reviews.text: One day shipping indeed!! I ordered these 6pm last evening and I got them at 137 pm today! Product is great for the home or auto. Absolutely no cons to this order. Best buy ever on Amazon. Also, the case, it comes in, is nice hard plastic and looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Friend in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. More tools than I would know what to do with. Probably can't make things spontaneously combust but what can you do?
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Bre

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Great tool kit bought for my husband to replace his that was starting to fall apart. Has tons of tools in it and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a new homeowner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son. He just bought a house and has no tools. He was ecstatic and couldn't thank me enough. I had to show him what tool does what. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for casual use
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter set for someone that is going out on their own or just to keep in a closet for quick use. Nothing fancy they just work for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Sockets do not stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the others. Nothing stays in its designated space. Sockets fall out and find their way under other tools. Just becomes a mess. Since most tool kits for this price range are worthless, I really was hoping this would be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: dwarmdem

customer_reviews.title: Wifetools
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, she thinks I got it for myself-great for her around the house
customer_reviews.author: Keith Burns

customer_reviews.title: good basic too  set
customer_reviews.text: everything is great and a good general tool set as a Christmas present for my daughter and a first general tool set for her. Also seller gives excellent customer support. Overall satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID P.

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot of tools in the package. ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of tools in this package. The tools came "loose," so I already found out it's challenging to find the spot they go back into; there isn't room for mistakes in placement because it's so compact. Other than that, should give me what I need for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Rainforest

customer_reviews.title: Great set !!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect. All tools seem to be of good quality. All pieces accounted for, some were loose upon arrival ... suppose this is due to being thrown around during delivery. All and all this is a great set to add to any collection or for your "first" kit!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Some of the items fall out.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tools and the variety included are good. The only issue is that some of the tools will fall out of the case when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: Awsome tool box for under the seat of the truck. I have pulled it out a few times to use it in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas W

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not bad at all!!
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of tools for the price. I got the tool set for my son and he really enjoys it. Nice to have around the house or throw in the trunk of your car.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband to use at his business for repairs. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Burget

customer_reviews.title: It’s usable I guess
customer_reviews.text: Not a high quality product however, if you need tools and don’t have enough money, this could do. One big knock on this tool box is that the tools fall out of place upon opening the box
customer_reviews.author: AVELINO RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Great set of sturdy tools with nice case
customer_reviews.text: Love this set ! I got this for my husband and he started to repair stuff right away. Very happy with this tool set has everything you need for around ten house and more! Tough case too
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Zo

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool set for a camper, or someone starting a tool collection. I bought this for my camper and the diversity of tools is great. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Smat

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Basic Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter as an apartment warming gift. Perfect basic tool kit for around an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Good selection of tools at a great value
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't classify this as a fine set of tools, but it's a nice complete set that I keep on my boat for periodic use. Have used them a couple of times and have had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Case could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The case isnt the best, messy upon delivery but that's probably shipping. Though closing is a pain with stuff sliding out. But all tools accounted for and it's doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Rukyius

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for our sons first tool kit for his car. He couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you need METRIC or US STANDARD?DARD?
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of the sockets, all of the pieces fit firmly in case. Each time that I open the case, I have to replace three or more pieces. I failed to realize that I had ordered a metric set of tools. I guess I will have to make do...
customer_reviews.author: Ed N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit for my 18 year old son whom loves it. This is a basic kit that can be helpful and useful for all kind of uses. I am thinking of getting one for myself too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect overall set
customer_reviews.text: been in the market to find a travel size overall kit for my work truck, light but frequent use. Checked Lowes, Home Depot, non provided an overall set like this. Been using for a few months now, no issues. Great price. Keep the foam piece that comes in there as it keeps tools tight and firm when in storage and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: concerned citizen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for our household. We aren't super handy but great for the little household up keep we need here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It has been a great kit to keep in my car and home as I have 2. I also gifted one to my son.
customer_reviews.author: peter m

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool set ,very organized and well thought out placement.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my college age son as his first tool kit. He appreciated the kit. Quality is generally ok ... great selection of tools. Features like cutter sharpness on pliers are not great but usable never the less.
customer_reviews.author: Flydadszk

customer_reviews.title: Good value and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Great tool kit for a novice who only dabbles in repairs. Nice assortment of tools in sturdy case
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This set is unbelievable. Just bought a house and it’s saved me about a million trips to the hardware store. Perfect for the diy homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Compact and handy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the tool kit for going on the road but have used it often since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: William P

customer_reviews.title: Cheap set of tools and it shows
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Daughter for Christmas. The blow molded case doesn't hold tools in place very well. I will have to get a small toolbox for them.
customer_reviews.author: Danny  Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any new homeowner that doesn’t have any of these tools. Everything included is pretty sturdy. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: First time I had to crank on a difficult bolt, socket snapped in half. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this tool set as a first set for my son. Has everything you need to do basic fixes. I was happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hd

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving my new tools! They are well made, not cheap. and for a great price. Has all the necessary tools in one place. very nice brand.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: poor quality case
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the case does NOT hold many of the individual pieces in place, especially the socket sets. I attempted to communicate with the manufacturer. They were not helpful and was obvious to me that they did not care about customer service. I will never use this company's products.
customer_reviews.author: Barry D

customer_reviews.title: Tools fall out of molded case
customer_reviews.text: While most of the tools are ok for general use, many of the pieces do not stay in the fitted molded case and are loose when you open the case.
customer_reviews.author: CFH 2

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, ok case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty consistent with what other people have said. Love the tools; I can do anything around the house with them. However not a big fan of the case. Several pieces don't stay snapped in, especially if the case gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: ulysses

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit has everything a person would normally use for car, home, boat or RV, not sure there is anything else you would need to take and it's all in a nice easy to use case.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully my last toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to borrow this kit. Pretty complete for 99% of jobs. Just remember how the tools fit back in the case.
customer_reviews.author: roland montagnino

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool set
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this kit to fix one of the side mirrors on my old truck. It comes with everything you could need, unless you are embarking on a major overhaul or are trying to remodel a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool Kit Ever
customer_reviews.text: I could not live without this kit. It has all of the tools I need for most of my repairs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: K Powell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety of everyday tools
customer_reviews.text: A very nice suit case tool set. Large variety of high quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: If you need a all in set this is pretty close to hitting all the jobs you need for ...
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat it for the price. If you need a all in set this is pretty close to hitting all the jobs you need for apartment living.
customer_reviews.author: HHS_Trojan

customer_reviews.title: A very good all in one kit
customer_reviews.text: A very good all in one kit. I had to knock it a star because the plastic used to hold everything in place is a little cheap feeling (still does it's job well enough though) and the smaller bits don't like to really latch on to the socket reducer for the ratchet.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Stepherson

product_meta.title: DEKOPRO 168 Piece Socket Wrench Auto Repair Tool Combination Package Mixed Tool Set Hand Tool Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY&STANDARDS:Forged from high-quality steel and finished in high-polish chrome,strength, durability, anti-corrosion protection.All the tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards

COMPLETE VARIETIES:Contains tools needed for most small repairs and basic DIY projects around the house.Perfect for Handyman’s, repairmen, construction workers, mechanics, body shops etc. also a great tool set to have at home, garage and the workshop

INCLUDES:Comprehensive assortment of professional-grade wrenches, ratchets, a complete range of 1/4 inch and 3/8inch metric-sized sockets and precision screwdriver, hammer, tape measure, pliers, wrench,and etc. The 72-tooth ratchet easily shift to change direction by flick of 5-degree switch.Variety of 1/4-inch screwdriver bits: Phillips, slotted, square, star and pozi.Also includes soft-grip handle on screwdriver, plier, srtipper and hammer provides excellent comfort and control
EASY TO CARRY&STORAGE:Housed in a handy blow-molded case for easy tool storage and portability. Its sturdy interior and organizer keeps tools in place
DESIGN OF GREAT ORGINALITY:Black case makes it dirt-resistant.Diamond shape design makes it unique and fashion .Case size:17.5"*13.5"*3.94".Net Weight 12.78 lb
